text: thæcring brrda phu totheiyng nı reuxng xa yat khx ngxallxhˌ (xalkurxan) doy prascak hlakthan mayang phwk khea nan mimi xari nı thrwngxk khxng phwk khea nxkcak txngkar ca pen hıy sung phwk khea ca mi pen phu brrlu thung man di dangnan cng khx khwam khum khrxng tx xallxhˌ thæcring phraxngkh pen phuthrng diyin phuthrng hen
